title: Daniel Z. Klein not working for Riot Games anymore
body:
https://i.imgur.com/2QBmiB7.png

He changed his job description on Twitter which doesn't include "Riot Games" anymore.

Of course we should wait for an official statement, but I am pretty sure they parted ways.

**Update**: It is official; he no longer works for Riot. Klein just shared this article:

https://kotaku.com/two-riot-employees-leave-under-complicated-circumstance-1828886072

**Update #2**: A new set of tweets he shared indicates that he got fired and we, the community, played a considerable part:

https://i.imgur.com/8YaFXJg.png

https://i.imgur.com/dSGZAOn.png

https://i.imgur.com/pGp9jGY.png

**Update #3**: Apparently Kotaku updated their article in terms of the reasons for Klein's departure:

"_[Update—3:15 pm EST]: Klein confirmed to The Verge that he was “fired for violating our_ [Riot's] _social media policy.”_"

The Verge article: https://www.theverge.com/2018/9/7/17827796/riot-games-employee-depart-women-only-pax-west-event
